description:
Hotaru, Ren, and Dracula all have birthmarks appear, revealing that they are also descendants of the bloodline. Hotaru’s powers had already come to light, so he didn’t have a hard time believing this fact, and Dracula seemed to also take the news okay. However, Ren insisted that this must’ve been some kind of coincidence, and refused to listen. Meanwhile, Haruto and Dracula awaken to their Butler powers, but Ren still refuses to believe it. Dracula sees a terrifying vision of his powers and he tells the others...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shiratori Ren no Yuuutsu na Ichinichi
Shiratori Ren`s Day Filled with Melancholy
